price: និងជ័យភណ្ឌជាច្រើនទៀតដែលពួកគេនឹងយកវា(ពីពួក យ៉ាហ៊ូទីនៅខយពើរ)។ ហើយអល់ឡោះមហាខ្លាំងពូកែ មហាគតិ-បណ្ឌិត។
arabic: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةٗ يَأۡخُذُونَهَاۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamaghānima kathīratan yakhudhūnahā wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
